actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget, S. Rept. 95-399.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, provisions inserted in H. Con. Res. 341.

official_title: A concurrent resolution revising the Congressional Budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year 1978.

summary.text: (Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, provisions inserted in H. Con. Res. 341) Sets forth congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1978. States that the recommended level of Federal revenues is $394,825,000,000 and the amount by which the aggregate level of Federal revenues should be decreased is $775,000,000. States that the appropriate level of total new budget authority is $501,400,000,000. Establishes the appropriate level of the public debt at $779,275,000,000. Sets for the appropriate level of new budget authority and the estimated budget outlays for each major functional category.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution revising the Congressional Budget for the U.S. Government for the fiscal year 1978.
